This guide is a simplified overview of all the changes in the {{BE}} 0.2.x releases, which assumes at least some familiarity with ''Bedrock Edition'' 0.1.x releases.

==Mobs==
===New===
{| {{Simple Guide table|New Mobs}}
|-
|[[Pig]]
|[[File:Pig JE2 BE1.png|128px]]
|Surface
|None
|Do not spawn naturally.
|-
|[[Sheep]]
|[[File:White Sheep BE1.png|128px]]
|Surface
|None
|Can be sheared to get wool.
|-
|[[Zombie]]
|[[File:Zombie JE2 BE1.png|128px]]
|Dark places
|None
|Melee attacks players.
|}

===Changed===
{| {{Simple Guide table|Changed Mobs}}
|-
|[[Camera]]
|[[File:Camera_BE2.png|128px]]
|
* Can now be obtainable with external editing.
* As the camera entity itself cannot be directly edited into the world since it does not save to entities.dat, the camera item has to be edited into the player's inventory, and that can then be used to place camera entities in a world.
* Can now use to take pictures.
|}

==Gameplay==
===New===
{|{{Simple Guide table|New Gameplay}}
|-
|[[Survival mode]]
|A new gamemode in which players have limited health and resources.
|-
|[[Health]]
|It is now possible to take damage, die, and respawn.
|-
|[[Day/night cycle]]
|Light levels change based on the time.
|-
|[[Flying]]
|A new ability available in creative mode, activated by double-tapping the jump button.
|}
